Lifestyle

Lifestyle

At Aroland, there is plenty of room to entertain, relax,and play with 15 playgrounds, a seasonal greenmarket and ice rink, and live music.

Freedom

Freedom

Exciting new LIC waterfront parks provide cool breezes, spectacular skyline views, running paths,ferry slips for a quick commute

Connection

Connection

New York City’s sole Michelin-starred Mexican restaurant and the acclaimed Wells dinette for great meals.
overview

welcome home

Aroland Luxury Apartments in Financial District, NYC combines two of the finest buildings in Lower Manhattan to provide a New York living experience unlike any other. Nestled in the heart of Manhattan’s historic, Aroland are unique in its perfect harmony of classic form and modern construction.

project info

  • 01. Project: Aroland
  • 02. Investor: Sunshine group
  • 03. Total Invested capital: $12,570,000
  • 04. Location: Queen Street Long Island City
  • 05. Area of park & lake: 3,157m
  • 06. Gross Site area: 16,187m
  • 07. Category: Luxury Apartment & Townhomes
  • 08. Lauch time: The Second Quarter of 2019

one bedroom

One bedroom apartment boasts an intricate touch of luxury in an ample space with a fully furnished living room, a cozy bedroom, a well-appointed kitchenette and two built-in bathrooms.

  • Total area 158 Sq Ft
  • Bedroom 1 18 Sq Ft
  • Bedroom 2 22 Sq Ft
  • Bathroom 22 Sq Ft
  • Kitchen 41 Sq Ft
  • Livingroom 25 Sq Ft
  • Windows 3
